snippet: A leading Kurdish political figure was shot to death in northern Syria, while a political dissident was brazenly beaten in the heart of the capital Damascus, activists said.

lead_paragraph: A leading Kurdish political figure was shot to death in northern Syria, while a political dissident was brazenly beaten in the heart of the capital Damascus, activists said.

headline.main: Leading Syrian Opposition Figure Killed, and Another Publicly Beaten
headline.print_headline: Syria Forces Said to Kill A Dissenter In the North
headline.seo: Attack by Syrian Forces Leaves Opposition Leader Dead
